name: Moonlight Grove
description:
You are a werewolf. Explore these woods, your home, beneath the light of the Moon.

(FOR BEST EFFECT, PLAY IN FULLSCREEN, AND MAYBE PUT SOME ATMOSPHERIC TUNES ON AS WELL)
This is a very very short proof of concept Twine game, mostly made for the sake of just trying out Twine and actually finishing something for once.

Enjoy!

(Cover photo taken by us, I know it's not nighttime but it's all I had to hand lmao)
